description:
On the website the is NOTHING about the actual program it's self, what it will or will not do.

No sales pitch at all.

That sucks.... you know seriously.

The only sign up to "join the project" so feed back can be left, goes to signing up to Patreon.

There is no other option.

And when the program is run, you cannot IMPORT any drawings... such as SolidJerks *.sldprt files... because the import / export sections of the menus are locked out...

Naaaaa this is too buggy for my liking.

Bypassing this distro.
summary: Some people just do not "get it"

description:
Absolutely Marvellous.

As someone who has worked with practically every major CAD/CAM software out there. I am amazed by the efforts, skill and the generosity of the developers of FreeCAD and especially of this branch. 

From the bottom of my heart, thank you realthunder
很棒，很棒，推荐使用，有商业软件风格了，非常利害
